text: Aleksander Kowalski (20 July 1930 - February 2009) was a Polish skier. He competed in the Nordic combined event at the 1956 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Polish male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Poland Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:People from Zakopane
title: Aleksander Kowalski (skier)
